name: Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa

reviews.text: Good hotel and resort. Excellent for access to the Water park.
reviews.title: Good Resort, close to Sunway Resort

reviews.text: Room good, but I would have liked a Balcony.
reviews.title: We simply loved it......

reviews.text: Next to the shopping mall which gives you a lot of other entertainment and food options.
reviews.title: Sunway Resort and Spa Kuala Lumper
Can't wait to bring the kids
reviews.text: I was staying there on business so did not have an opportunity to use the pool areas but they looked good and clean.

reviews.title: We loved the stay
reviews.text: The room I had was a double, which was a little on the small side but as good as any 4 star hotel double room I have stayed in at a European Resort.
The hotel is grand and definitely you can say it's a 5 star standard.
reviews.title: Short getaway during school holiday

reviews.text: The ambience, scent, decoration etc, are simply beyond descriptions. The money is definitely worth spending. The staffs are all very friendly & attentive to our needs. We feel so welcomed with their excellent services and good attitude.
reviews.title: INCONVENIENCE TO THE MAX!!!

reviews.text: You feel safe as the security are tight and at any time of the day, you'll be armly greeted by the staffs. Even housekeeping personels are also doing a gret job.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel but atrocious service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having to stay in Sunway Resort & Spa Hotel for a vocation, you will not have any regrets
reviews.title: Satisfactory Stay....

reviews.text: INCONVENIENT STAY!
reviews.title: Nice family vacation

reviews.text: This is an excellent hotel. My family thoroughly enjoyed it. Dont forget to visit the swimming pool. Everything was perfect- from the frontdesk staff to small things in the room. The floors were a little confusing! If you are planning to be in KL, then you should not stay here. Travel from Sunway to KL is difficult and ridden with traffic.
reviews.title: Great Hotel- Strongly Recommended

reviews.text: For Some reason I was not able to sleep well all three nights- the pillows were huge and the bed was a little hard.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: I have been to sunway resort for two nights. It was amazing experience its nice & clean hotel. Close to the park but very complicated because the lobby is in level 13 & my room in level 5 + you have to wait for 10 or 15 minutes to find empty elevator if you have a baby trolley this is the only bad thing in the hotel. The break fast timings is not good.
reviews.title: Exceptional
Great place to visit
reviews.text: We have returned to this Sunway Beach Lagoon hotel many times. For service and attention, they leave nothing to chance in ensuring guests are appreciated. Facilities, food, swimming pool, attention to detail in guests rooms, all excellent. As a past tour organiser and guide I rate this hotel number 1.

The normal rooms seem a Little dated and renovations are needed especially with furniture. Overall though it's an amazing concept, theme park is fantastic and a great place for kids. The Villas however are an untapped secret and they are beautiful and strictly for adults.
reviews.title: everything in one place

reviews.text: Very near to pyramid shopping mall , Best Disc is also nearby . Sunway lagoon is also there , their breakfast is one of the best i had in any resort .
reviews.title: Wow experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would say try to visit this place in the month of December end - January start It’s really a haven that time beautifully decorated for festive season
reviews.title: suitable for couple. near to sunway pyramid shopping heaven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stay in the hotel in feb 2013.pleasent place.well decorated during chinese new year . stay 2 nights. room was comfortable. pyramiid shopping heaven near by , there's a link path from resort to shopping mall. breakfast a lot of variety,taste acepptable.ordinary. staff all are friendly.
reviews.title: 2D1N Trip at Sunway Resort Hotel

reviews.text: Something good about this hotel:
reviews.title: Sunway Lagoon- a paradise for children
Great place to stay
reviews.text: 1. Near the Sunway Pyramid shopping mall, can enjoy your whole day shopping in the mall.

description: Just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport and 25 minutes from the city centre, the 5-star Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa offers a collection of 441 well-appointed guestrooms. Within the amazing 800-acre “Resort-within-a-City” landmark are the Balinese-inspired Mandara Spa, an award-winning theme park, and an upscale mega shopping and entertainment mall. There are also a massive convention centre, a medical centre and educational facilities.
